siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Like a fitness tracker for your code. Our contribution analytics empower devs with insight. Let the code speak for itself with dashboards & badges focused on self-improvement & career growth. See where you measure up & translate commits into insights.
blogPost.body: Like a fitness tracker for your code. Our contribution analytics empower devs with insight. Let the code speak for itself with dashboards & badges focused on self-improvement & career growth. See where you measure up & translate commits into insights.
blogPost.title: Merico Build - Free analytics to level up your code & career
blogPost.author: Maxim Wheatley

localize.description: 就像代码的健康跟踪器一样。我们的贡献分析为开发人员提供了洞察力。让代码用仪表板和徽章为自己说话，这些仪表板和徽章侧重于自我提升和职业发展。看一看你的衡量标准&把承诺转化为洞察力。
localize.tagline: 免费分析，提升您的代码和职业水平

localize.description: 就像代碼的健康跟蹤器一樣。我們的貢獻分析爲開發人員提供了洞察力。讓代碼用儀表板和徽章爲自己說話，這些儀表板和徽章側重於自我提升和職業發展。看一看你的衡量標準&把承諾轉化爲洞察力。
localize.tagline: 免費分析，提升您的代碼和職業水平

previous.excerpt: ProStyles is an AI camera app that edits your photos & videos in the style of pro photographers as you shoot them. The built-in Style Store features AI style models created by some of the best photographers out there.
previous.title: ProStyle Camera by NeuralCam - AI Cam App - Photos auto-edited in the style of pros

localize.description: ProStyles是一款人工智能相机应用程序，在你拍摄照片和视频时，它会以专业摄影师的风格编辑它们。内置风格商店的特色是由一些最好的摄影师创建的人工智能风格模型。
localize.tagline: AI Cam App-照片以专业风格自动编辑

localize.description: ProStyles是一款人工智能相機應用程序，在你拍攝照片和視頻時，它會以專業攝影師的風格編輯它們。內置風格商店的特色是由一些最好的攝影師創建的人工智能風格模型。
localize.tagline: AI Cam App-照片以專業風格自動編輯

next.excerpt: LiveChat newest integration with Mailchimp helps you get in touch with your website visitors by displaying an interactive greeting that allows them to sign up to your newsletter list.
next.title: Mailchimp Newsletters widget by LiveChat - Get more newsletter signups from your website

localize.description: livechat最新集成了Mail猩猩，通过显示交互式问候语帮助您与网站访问者取得联系，允许他们注册您的时事通讯列表。
localize.tagline: 从您的网站获取更多时事通讯注册

localize.description: livechat最新集成了Mail猩猩，通過顯示交互式問候語幫助您與網站訪問者取得聯繫，允許他們註冊您的時事通訊列表。
localize.tagline: 從您的網站獲取更多時事通訊註冊
